name: travel-itinerary-app
description: Professional AI-powered travel itinerary generator with advanced features including authentication, weather integration, currency conversion, and export capabilities

scripts.build: npm run build:static && npm run build:api
scripts.build:static: echo 'Building static files...' && cp -r public/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Static files ready'
scripts.build:api: echo 'Building API functions...' && mkdir -p dist/api && cp -r api/* dist/api/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'API files ready'

author: Travel Itinerary App Team
